headline: Alabama Power, Georgia Power and Mississippi Power All Named to Site Selection Magazine's 2025 Top Utilities List
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / September 30, 2025 / Alabama Power, Georgia Power and Mississippi Power have been named to Site Selection magazine's Top Utilities list for 2025, which honors American utilities for their work in economic development. ...

headline: Southern Company third-quarter earnings to be released October 30
summary: Southern Company plans to release its earnings for the third quarter of 2025 by 7:30 a.m. ET on Thursday, October 30, 2025.

raw.headline: Southern Company third-quarter earnings to be released October 30
raw.summary: Southern Company plans to release its earnings for the third quarter of 2025 by 7:30 a.m. ET on Thursday, October 30, 2025.

headline: Georgia Power highlights first contracts under new rules & regulations, continued economic growth and updated forecasts in latest filings with Georgia PSC
summary: Georgia Power has filed nearly 2 gigawatts of new customer contracts with the Georgia Public Service Commission (PSC), marking a major milestone for the state's energy landscape. These agreements are the first to be reached under the Georgia PSC's newly approved rules and regulations, which are designed to provide Georgia Power with the flexibility to sustainably serve large-load customers while safeguarding residential and small business customers from additional costs.
